item.description:
Running Clinic


Discover the proven formula for fast, efficient and effortless running technique used by the most accomplished and successful runners and athletes on the planet.  During this 3 hour clinic you will learn precisely why you’ve been taught to run incorrectly, like so many others.  You will also begin to understand how improper running form can lead to one or more of the common running injuries seen in today’s runners, exercisers and athletic community (shin splints, runner’s knee, back/knee pain, IT band syndrome and many more…).

In this clinic you will learn the science of proper running along with gaining practical hand-on drills to dramatically improve your running performance and technique as well as avoiding common running overuse injuries. This clinic is not one of those “all show, no go” lecture series loaded with a bunch of fluff and B.S.  You will learn hands-on doing specific running drills as well as special technique work so you can immediately apply what you learn.

To top it all off, you will be amazed at how dramatic of an effect these drills will have on your technique and speed when your personal video assessment of your running form is analyzed both before and after you learn how to apply these running methods.

Don’t wait to register for this clinic, it WILL SELL OUT! Space is limited to a maximum of 30 people!

Cost is $49 for Active CFEXP Members and $69 for non-Members and includes the 3-hour Clinic, info packet and individual video analysis.


Register now choosing the link below to reserve your spot!

 

Click Here to Register!

 

 

What Are People Saying About this Running Clinic?


“For anyone on the Fence regarding this Running Clinic I highly recommend it. I attended this clinic back when FC was at Erdman Way. Had running injury issues prior to the clinic and…”knock on wood”,have not had any injuries due to running since. Running feels more relaxed and natural and it certainly made me faster.” – Kathy H.

“Thank you so much for holding  the running camp today.  It was AWESOME! I had no idea how bad my running technique was!  I am really excited to utilize the lessons you taught.  I understand it will take a little time to get used to, but I have no doubt that what I learned will make me a better, faster runner and help to prevent all of those nasty injuries!  Running will never be the same! Thanks so much!” - Jason R.


 “The workshop was fabulous!! I can’t believe how much of it made such an impact on me – just seeing all the visuals as well as the discussion part was so insightful.” - Lynn L.


“Thanks for a great day on Saturday!  I thought the seminar was awesome, a real eye opener.  Having heard of Pose before, and having already tried to incorporate some of it’s points, it was a real eye opener to see my stride on video tape.  I never would have guessed I was actually leaning back, and heel striking.  One of the best points of the whole seminar was to actually use your hamstring more, rather than the hip flexor.  Also, the explanation of how a 90+ cadence helps really made sense.  I think with some practice, this will really help me with what I am trying to accomplish.” - Rob H.

 

AnonymousTestimonials:

“Well Worth the time, very helpful!”

“Great presentation, was not presented above our heads, non-threatening/ good group”

“Do it, it was great!”

“Fun, new way of learning to run”

“It is ultra-worthwhile and helpful and excellently presented!”

“You may think you are running your best, but you could benefit from the seminar and improve your technique”

“it’s the best, you have to take it!”

“I think it is worth doing!”

“Worth the time!”

“very comprehensive and scientific based”

“very helpful”

“very effective way to run faster, smarter, and safer!”

“great information, effective, makes you faster and stronger”

“Great info, I was able to apply the information immediately. Effective use of videoing to see areas of weakness and improvement”

“good opportunity to learn proper from and technique”

“10 out of 10, Nick is highly knowledgeable and explained things in such a way that the concepts of POSE running made absolute sense!”

“You need to go, you will learn new ideas you have never thought of, regardless of how good or experienced you are”

“If you are serious about running, take this clinic!”
item.name: Running Clinic @ CrossFit EXP
